title: How to Type Bold Text on Telegram on Android

steps.title: Open Telegram on your Android.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your Android. It’s the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You will usually find it in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap a chat.
steps.content: Tap a chat. This opens the conversation.

steps.title: Type the word or phrase you want to appear in bold.
steps.content: Type the word or phrase you want to appear in bold. There’s no need to insert a space between ** and the word(s).

steps.title: Type another ** at the end.
steps.content: Type another ** at the end. The finished product should look something like this: **These words will be bold** .

steps.title: Tap the send button.
steps.content: Tap the send button. It’s the blue paper airplane at the bottom-right corner of the screen. The words between the double-asterisks appear in strong bold letters. You can include regular (not bold) words in the same message. Just don’t surround those words with asterisks.
